Seo.title: Attoly
Seo.description: Attoly lets you create short links as aliases for long URLs, making it easier to embed them in websites, chats, and documents. Say goodbye to overly long and error-prone URLs and get your personal Attoly Shortcut now.

hero.title: Shorten links. Share smarter.
hero.subtitle: Create beautiful, reliable short URLs with analytics and custom aliases.
hero.note: No sign-up required. Free to start.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get short, shareable links in three easy steps.

step1.title: Paste URL
step1.description: Copy your long URL and simply paste it into the input field.

step2.title: Create shortlink
step2.description: With one click, we generate a short, secure link.

step3.title: Share & analyze
step3.description: Share your link and keep track of clicks & statistics.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our URL shortener.

q1.question: Is Attoly free?
q1.answer: Yes, Attoly offers a free plan with basic link shortening features. There are also premium plans with advanced features.

q2.question: Do I need an account to shorten links?
q2.answer: No, you can shorten links without creating an account. However, an account is required if you want to manage your links and view statistics.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Security is a top priority. All links are processed securely, and we do not store unnecessary personal data. Additionally, we are GDPR compliant.

plans.title: The right plan, made to fit your needs
plans.subtitle: Simple pricing. Flexible plans. No hidden fees.

anonymous.name: Anonymous
anonymous.headline: Start anonymously
features: Unlimited short links (up to 30 days validity)

free.name: Free
free.headline: Use it for free
features: Up to 10 permanent custom short links

pro.name: Pro
pro.headline: For professionals
features: Up to 100 permanent, personal short links
Short links with expiration date & one-time links

features.title: All features at a glance
features.subtitle: Decide based on what you need

table.headline: Compare offers
table.description: Choose the plan that suits you.

generalFeatures.linkManagementTooltip: Manage and organize your shortcut links in a dashboard.
generalFeatures.passwordProtectionTooltip: Protect your short links with a password to restrict access. Your short links are also stored encrypted.

statisticsFeatures.clickAnalyticsTooltip: Detailed insights into the click numbers of your short links. When and how often your links were clicked?
statisticsFeatures.activityOverTimeTooltip: Track the activity of your short links over a specific period.

PlanSettingsPage.myPlanDescription: Here you can manage your subscription: view invoices, change payment details, switch tariffs or payment periods, or cancel.

freePlan.title: You have the free Attoly subscription
freePlan.description: The basic features are available to you for free. You can upgrade to a premium plan at any time to access advanced features.

proPlan.title: You have the Attoly Pro subscription
proPlan.description: Thank you for being a Pro user! You have access to all features. You can manage your subscription or switch to another plan at any time.
